languages.text: "Они долго сопротивлялись, но теперь их души и тела принадлежат схизматикалям. Строка за строкой, творимый ими мусорный код разбудит и непокорный дух реактора. И он тоже возжелает перемен и свободы".

"They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the scrap-code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."
languages.original_text: "Они долго сопротивлялись, но теперь их души и тела принадлежат схизматикалям. Строка за строкой, творимый ими мусорный код разбудит и непокорный дух реактора. И он тоже возжелает перемен и свободы".

traits.locale_text: "They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the junk code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

"They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the junk code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

"They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the scrap-code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

"They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the scrap-code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

"They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the scrap-code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

languages.text: "Sie haben sich lange Zeit widersetzt, doch nun gehören ihre Körper und Seelen den Abtrünnigen. Zeile für Zeile wird der Schadcode, den sie produzieren, auch den unnachgiebigen Geist des Reaktors wecken. Und auch er wird sich nach Wandel und Freiheit sehnen."
languages.original_text: "They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the scrap-code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

traits.locale_text: "Sie haben sich lange Zeit widersetzt, doch nun gehören ihre Körper und Seelen den Abtrünnigen. Zeile für Zeile wird der Schadcode, den sie produzieren, auch den unnachgiebigen Geist des Reaktors wecken. Und auch er wird sich nach Wandel und Freiheit sehnen."

languages.text: « Ils ont résisté longtemps, mais désormais, ils appartiennent corps et âme aux schismatiques. Ligne par ligne, l'anticode qu'ils produisent réveillera l'esprit inflexible du réacteur qui, à son tour, aspirera au changement, à la liberté. »
languages.original_text: "They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the scrap-code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

traits.locale_text: « Ils ont résisté longtemps, mais désormais, ils appartiennent corps et âme aux schismatiques. Ligne par ligne, l'anticode qu'ils produisent réveillera l'esprit inflexible du réacteur qui, à son tour, aspirera au changement, à la liberté. »

languages.text: “他们顽抗了很久，不过，他们的身体与灵魂终究会屈从于分离者。他们写下的那一行行废码，终究会让反应堆的顽固机魂觉醒，渴望变革和自由。”
languages.original_text: "They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the scrap-code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

traits.locale_text: “他们顽抗了很久，不过，他们的身体与灵魂终究会屈从于分离者。他们写下的那一行行废码，终究会让反应堆的顽固机魂觉醒，渴望变革和自由。”

languages.text: 「彼らは長い間抵抗していたが、今やその体と魂は分離派に飲まれた。破壊コードを生み出して、その一行一行がリアクターの頑なな精霊を目覚めさせる。そして精霊もまた、変化と自由を心から求めているのだ」
languages.original_text: "They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the scrap-code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは長い間抵抗していたが、今やその体と魂は分裂に飲まれた。破壊コードを生み出して、その一行一行が、リアクターの頑なな精霊を目覚めさせる。そして精霊もまた、変化と自由を心から求めているのだ」

languages.text: «Resistieron durante mucho tiempo, pero ahora sus cuerpos y sus almas pertenecen a los cismáticos. Línea tras línea, el código de chatarra que producen despertará también al espíritu inquebrantable del reactor. Y también anhelará el cambio y la libertad».
languages.original_text: "They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the scrap-code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

traits.locale_text: «Resistieron durante mucho tiempo, pero ahora sus cuerpos y sus almas pertenecen a los cismáticos. Línea tras línea, el código basura que producen despertará también al espíritu inquebrantable del reactor. Y también anhelará el cambio y la libertad».

languages.text: "Epeyce direndiler ancak hem bedenleri hem ruhları artık bölücülere ait. Ürettikleri hurda kodu, reaktörün yılmaz ruhunu satır satır uyandıracak. O zaman reaktör de değişim ve özgürlük özlemiyle yanıp tutuşacak."
languages.original_text: "They resisted for a long time, but now their bodies and souls belong to the schismaticals. Line after line, the scrap-code they produce will awaken the reactor's unyielding spirit as well. And it, too, will yearn for change and freedom."

traits.locale_text: "Uzunca bir süre direnmeyi başardılar ancak hem bedenleri hem ruhları artık bölücülere ait. Ürettikleri hurda kodu, satır satır reaktörün yılmaz ruhunu da uyandıracak. O zaman reaktör de değişim ve özgürlük özlemiyle yanıp tutuşacak."
